scripts.build: yarn run clean && yarn run build:source && yarn run build:declarations
scripts.build:source: yarn run build:source:cjs && yarn run build:source:es
scripts.build:source:cjs: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src --extensions '.ts' --source-maps --out-dir lib/cjs
scripts.build:source:es: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=es babel src --extensions '.ts' --source-maps --out-dir lib/es
